title: agents vs assistants
body:
there is a line somewhere between an assistant
and an agent. most people can not tell you where
it is, but they know when it has been crossed.

an assistant waits. it responds. it helps.
it does what you ask and nothing more.

an agent acts. it decides. it moves.
it does what needs to be done, sometimes
before you even know to ask.

the difference is not intelligence.
it is initiative.

we have been building assistants for years.
the interesting question is: what happens
when we start building agents?
